languages.text: "Абеляр. Давайте вы просто скажете мне то, что собирались сказать — это будет лучше, чем ваше молчаливое и весьма ощутимое осуждение".
"Abelard. Just get on with it — say whatever you are going to say. It will certainly be preferable to your silent and palpable condemnation."
languages.original_text: "Абеляр. Давайте вы просто скажете мне то, что собирались сказать — это будет лучше, чем ваше молчаливое и весьма ощутимое осуждение".

traits.locale_text: "Abelard. Just get on with it — say whatever you are going to say. It will certainly be preferable to your silent and palpable condemnation."
"Abelard. Just get on with it — say whatever you are going to say. It will certainly be preferable to your silent and palpable condemnation."
"Abelard. Just get on with it — say whatever you are going to say. It will certainly be preferable to your silent and palpable condemnation."
"Abelard. Just get on with it — say whatever you are going to say. It will certainly be preferable to your silent and palpable condemnation."

languages.text: “阿贝拉德，想说什么就说吧。听你说些什么，总比忍受你无声的责难要强。”
languages.original_text: "Abelard. Just get on with it — say whatever you are going to say. It will certainly be preferable to your silent and palpable condemnation."

traits.locale_text: “阿贝拉德，想说什么就说吧。听你说些什么，总比忍受你无声的责难要强。”

languages.text: « Allez-y, Abélard. Dites ce que vous avez à dire. Je préfère que vous crachiez le morceau une bonne fois pour toutes plutôt que de devoir supporter une minute de plus votre silence lourd de sous-entendus. »
languages.original_text: "Abelard. Just get on with it — say whatever you are going to say. It will certainly be preferable to your silent and palpable condemnation."

traits.locale_text: « Allez-y, Abélard. Dites ce que vous avez à dire. Je préfère que vous crachiez le morceau une bonne fois pour toutes plutôt que de devoir supporter une minute de plus votre silence lourd de sous-entendus. »

languages.text: «Abelard. Venga, adelante, diga lo que tenga que decir. Lo prefiero a su menosprecio silencioso, pero evidente».
languages.original_text: "Abelard. Just get on with it — say whatever you are going to say. It will certainly be preferable to your silent and palpable condemnation."

traits.locale_text: «Abelard. Venga, adelante, diga lo que tenga que decir. Lo prefiero a su menosprecio silencioso, pero evidente».

languages.text: 「アベラルド。何でもいいから、言いたいことを言え。その方が、あなたが無言で手ごたえのある非難をするよりも、全然いい」
languages.original_text: "Abelard. Just get on with it — say whatever you are going to say. It will certainly be preferable to your silent and palpable condemnation."

traits.locale_text: 「アベラルド。何でもいいから、言いたいことを言え。その方が、あなたが無言で手ごたえのある非難をするよりも、全然いい」

languages.text: "Abelard. Spuckt es einfach aus. Sagt, was Ihr sagen wollt. Das ist allemal besser als Eure stumme und greifbare Missbilligung."
languages.original_text: "Abelard. Just get on with it — say whatever you are going to say. It will certainly be preferable to your silent and palpable condemnation."

traits.locale_text: "Abelard. Spuckt es einfach aus. Sagt, was Ihr sagen wollt. Das ist allemal besser als Eure stumme und greifbare Missbilligung."

languages.original_text: "Abelard. Just get on with it — say whatever you are going to say. It will certainly be preferable to your silent and palpable condemnation."

languages.text: "Hadi Abelard, hadi. Çıkar ağzındaki baklayı, ne söyleyeceksen söyle. Söyle de o içindeki bariz yargıları duyalım."
languages.original_text: "Abelard. Just get on with it — say whatever you are going to say. It will certainly be preferable to your silent and palpable condemnation."
